name: plan_solution
description:
Call yourself to create an implementation plan. Use after reading tests/code when you need to think carefully before implementing. Has access to full conversation history.

Accepted arg aliases:
- question / query / request / text / content / thought -> prompt

Examples:
- {{tool:plan_solution}}({"prompt": "Create implementation plan for passing all tests"})
- {{tool:plan_solution}}({"question": "What edge cases should I handle based on the tests?"})

prompt.description: Your question or request for the planning analysis
